text.autoconfig.map_atlases.title: Map Atlases Config
text.autoconfig.map_atlases.option.activ: Controls location where mini-map displays. Any of: 'HANDS', ,'HOTBAR', or 'INVENTORY'.
text.autoconfig.map_atlases.option.drawM: If 'true', the Mini-Map of the Active Map will be drawn on the HUD while the Atlas is active.
text.autoconfig.map_atlases.option.enabl: Enable Empty Map Entry And Fill
If 'true', Atlases will be able to store Empty Maps and auto-fill them as you explore.
text.autoconfig.map_atlases.option.force: Scale the mini-map to a given % of the height of your screen.
Scale the world-map to a given % of the height of your screen.
text.autoconfig.map_atlases.option.maxMa: The maximum number of Maps (Filled & Empty combined) allowed to be inside an Atlas (-1 to disable).
text.autoconfig.map_atlases.option.miniM: Set to any of 'Upper'/'Lower' & 'Left'/'Right' to control anchor position of mini-map
Enter an integer which will offset the mini-map horizontally
Enter an integer which will offset the mini-map vertically
text.autoconfig.map_atlases.option.mapEn: Controls how many usable Maps are added when you add a single Map to the Atlas
text.autoconfig.map_atlases.option.pityA: Controls how many free Empty Maps you get for 'activating' an Inactive Atlas
text.autoconfig.map_atlases.option.activ: The number of pixels to shift vertically when there's an active effect
text.autoconfig.map_atlases.option.drawM: When enabled, the player's current Coords will be displayed
When enabled, the player's current Biome will be displayed
text.autoconfig.map_atlases.option.minim: Sets the scale of the text rendered for Coords and Biome mini-map data
text.autoconfig.map_atlases.option.drawW: When enabled, the Atlas world map coordinates will be displayed
text.autoconfig.map_atlases.option.world: Sets the scale of the text rendered for Coords world-map data
text.autoconfig.map_atlases.option.miniM: Sets the scale of the map icons rendered in the mini-map
text.autoconfig.map_atlases.option.world: Sets the scale of the map icons rendered in the world-map
text.autoconfig.map_atlases.option.accep: If enabled, you can increase the Empty Map count by inserting Paper
text.autoconfig.map_atlases.option.sound: Multiplier for all the Atlases sound float
text.autoconfig.map_atlases.option.requi: If true, the Atlas is required to have spare Empty Maps stored to expand the Filled Map size
